bindings.title: Diagnosis (type of appendicitis)
bindings.note: An autocomplete field to select between all descendants of appendicitis.

bindings.title: Clinical note
bindings.note: A text box for entering free text clinical information.

bindings.title: Appendicitis type
bindings.note: A single selection dropdown field for a shorter selection of the type of appendicitis.

bindings.title: Appendicitis type (M)
bindings.note: A multiple selection dropdown field for a shorter selection of the type of appendicitis.

bindings.title: Appendicectomy type
bindings.note: A radio buttons selector for the type of appendicectomy procedure.
